Steve Ballmer says SharePoint lets more business users in an organization publish content to the Web without having to involve IT. Marketing, sales, customer service people desire to move things along quickly, and without necessarily on every transaction having IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that, said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek.
